member.name: INPUT_INJECTION_VALUE
member.seealso: Universal Serial Bus HID Usage Tables - USB.org

summary.para: The Usage Page ID, such as VR Controls Page (0x03) or Game Controls Page (0x05).
The Usage ID associated with a Usage Page, such as Turn Right/Left (21) or Move Right/Left (24) for a Game Controls Page.
The Usage index, such as the selected item in a radio button set.
